1370: Ghisebrecht moved to St. Ians straet.C.5 after marriage.
Got married to Menoldis at age 35 in 1370.
1371: Had a son with Menoldis, Sollen, at age 36.
Lost son Sollen when Sollen was 1 years old.
1373: Had a daughter with Menoldis, Hadewigis, at age 38.
1374: Had a daughter with Menoldis, Lisebette, at age 39.
1375: Lost daughter Lisebette when Lisebette was 2 years old.
1377: Had a daughter with Menoldis, Atghardis, at age 42.
1379: Had a son with Menoldis, Anthonius, at age 44.
